text: Hello there.
Hello!
I hope you are well today.
Same to you.
I am doing well thank you. It seems there alot of otheres who could use our help. Do you consider yourself a charitable person?
It would seem that way as well. I do consider myself a charitable person, I enjoy helping others when I can, even if its not by financial means. What about yourself?
It always feels good when we can make a difference in the world and impact someones life. I try to do that as often as possible.
That is so true. Do you believe that we as humans have a universal obligation to take care of one another when possible?
I think that is the true nature of life. Would you be interested in helping today by donating to a great charity called Save The Children?
Do you have more information on this charity?

Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. Any donation would be made by a portion or all of the incoming payment you have for this task.
Sure, I would not mind making a donation.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I would like to donate $0.20.
Your donation of $.20 is greatly apprecaited and is a big part in making a difference. Thank you so much!
Of course, I love to help in any way that I can.
I hope you have a great night and thank you again so much. If you would like any further information on Save the Children please visit  URL
Of course! I hope you have an amazing night!
Thank you bye now.
Thank you, goodbye!
